statements: SELECT * FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, qualification_level FROM employee_certifications WHERE qualification_level > 2;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_name = 'AWS Certified';
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC, qualification_level ASC;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employee_certifications WHERE qualification_level > 2;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications WHERE qualification_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) as total_certifications FROM employee_certifications GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_certifications > 2;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM EmployeeCertifications;
SELECT certification_name, employee_id, certification_date FROM EmployeeCertifications;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT module_name, module_description FROM TrainingModules;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE certification_name = 'First Aid Certification';
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_certifications FROM EmployeeCertifications GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT ec.certification_name, tm.module_name FROM EmployeeCertifications ec JOIN TrainingModules tm ON ec.certification_name = tm.certification_required;
SELECT ec.employee_id, tm.module_name FROM EmployeeCertifications ec LEFT JOIN TrainingModules tm ON ec.certification_name = tm.certification_required WHERE tm.module_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, certification_id FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, qualification_id FROM Employees WHERE certification_id = 3;
SELECT employee_name, qualification_name FROM Employees JOIN Qualifications ON Employees.qualification_id = Qualifications.qualification_id;
SELECT DISTINCT certification_id FROM Employees;

SELECT e.employee_name, c.certification_name, q.qualification_name
FROM Employees e
JOIN Certifications c ON e.certification_id = c.certification_id
JOIN Qualifications q ON e.qualification_id = q.qualification_id
ORDER BY e.employee_name ASC

SELECT e.employee_name, q.qualification_name
FROM Employees e
JOIN Qualifications q ON e.qualification_id = q.qualification_id
WHERE e.certification_id IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY q.qualification_level DESC

SELECT e.employee_name, c.certification_name, q.qualification_name
FROM Employees e
LEFT JOIN Certifications c ON e.certification_id = c.certification_id
LEFT JOIN Qualifications q ON e.qualification_id = q.qualification_id
ORDER BY c.certification_name ASC, q.qualification_name DESC

SELECT e.employee_name, c.certification_name, q.qualification_name
FROM Employees e
JOIN Certifications c ON e.certification_id = c.certification_id
JOIN Qualifications q ON e.qualification_id = q.qualification_id
WHERE q.qualification_level > 2
ORDER BY e.employee_name DESC

SELECT e.employee_name, c.certification_name, q.qualification_name
FROM Employees e
JOIN Certifications c ON e.certification_id = c.certification_id
JOIN Qualifications q ON e.qualification_id = q.qualification_id
WHERE c.certification_id IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY c.certification_name ASC
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, qualification_name, qualification_level FROM employee_qualifications ORDER BY qualification_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_modules WHERE module_description LIKE '%advanced%';
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_certifications FROM employee_certifications GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT module_name, module_description FROM training_modules ORDER BY module_id DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_type FROM assessments WHERE assessment_type = 'final' ORDER BY assessment_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_department FROM employees;
SELECT certification_id, certification_name, certification_category, certification_duration FROM certifications WHERE certification_duration > 12;

SELECT employee_name, certification_name, certification_category FROM employees JOIN employee_certifications ON employees.employee_id = employee_certifications.employee_id JOIN certifications ON employee_certifications.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT * FROM qualification_modules WHERE module_description LIKE '%advanced%';
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date, assessment_result FROM employee_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employees WHERE certification_status = TRUE;

SELECT employee_name, certification_name, certification_category FROM employees JOIN employee_certifications ON employees.employee_id = employee_certifications.employee_id JOIN certifications ON employee_certifications.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT employee_name, assessment_date, assessment_result FROM employees JOIN employee_assessments ON employees.employee_id = employee_assessments.employee_id;

SELECT employee_name, module_name, module_description FROM employees JOIN employee_assessments ON employees.employee_id = employee_assessments.employee_id JOIN qualification_modules ON employee_assessments.module_id = qualification_modules.module_id;
